Uses of Interface
javax.xml.crypto.dsig.SignedInfo

  • Packages that use SignedInfo 
    Package Description
    javax.xml.crypto.dsig
    Classes for generating and validating XML digital signatures.

    • Uses of SignedInfo in javax.xml.crypto.dsig

      Methods in javax.xml.crypto.dsig that return SignedInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SignedInfo XMLSignature.getSignedInfo()
      Returns the signed info of this XMLSignature.
      abstract SignedInfo XMLSignatureFactory.newSignedInfo(CanonicalizationMethod cm, SignatureMethod sm, List references)
      Creates a SignedInfo with the specified canonicalization and signature methods, and list of one or more references.
      abstract SignedInfo XMLSignatureFactory.newSignedInfo(CanonicalizationMethod cm, SignatureMethod sm, List references, String id)
      Creates a SignedInfo with the specified parameters.
      Methods in javax.xml.crypto.dsig with parameters of type SignedInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract XMLSignature XMLSignatureFactory.newXMLSignature(SignedInfo si, KeyInfo ki)
      Creates an XMLSignature and initializes it with the contents of the specified SignedInfo and KeyInfo objects.
      abstract XMLSignature XMLSignatureFactory.newXMLSignature(SignedInfo si, KeyInfo ki, List objects, String id, String signatureValueId)
      Creates an XMLSignature and initializes it with the specified parameters.
